text: Ricky Powell (November 20, 1961 â€“ February 1, 2021) was an American photographer. He was known for his works with the Beastie Boys. His pictures were seen in The New York Times, the New York Post, the Daily News, The Village Voice, TIME, Newsweek, VIBE, The Source and Rolling Stone. He was born in New York City. Powell died on February 1, 2021 from heart failure in New York City, aged 59.Iconic NYC hip-hop photographer Ricky Powell dead at 59 ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:American photographers Category:Artists from New York City
title: Ricky Powell
